description: This is a test module for the 'ping_ip' function in 'backend.services.ping', containing unit tests that mock network responses to verify different behaviors (online, offline, exception) of the 'ping_ip' function.

classes.name: MagicMock
classes.description: Mock object used to simulate the ping response in tests.

methods.name: test_ping_ip_online(mock_ping)
methods.description: Tests the 'ping_ip' function when the ping is successful and the host is online.

methods.name: test_ping_ip_offline(mock_ping)
methods.description: Tests the 'ping_ip' function when the ping fails and the host is offline.

methods.name: test_ping_ip_exception(mock_ping)
methods.description: Tests the 'ping_ip' function when a RuntimeError occurs during the ping process, simulating an exception scenario.
